title: plzip fatal error dependency
body:
Hi,
I know that plzip is not your program but it is a dependency. I have all dependencies installed including lzlib-1.8 and also tried lzlib-1.5. lzip runs without error, but plzip will not compile without fatal error. I searched online and could find no mention of this error. I do not have root priveleges so can not do apt-get, I configured everything with the --prefix=$HOME.

gcc 4.4.7 also tried gcc 5.2.0
linux with tsch or zsh

The error is in not finding lzlib.h. I put it in the path it is also in /include. I have no idea why it isnt working. 

Any advice?

error with gcc 5.2.0:
g++  -Wall -W -O2 -c -o arg_parser.o arg_parser.cc
g++  -Wall -W -O2 -c -o file_index.o file_index.cc
g++  -Wall -W -O2 -c -o compress.o compress.cc
compress.cc:34:19: fatal error: lzlib.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
make: **\* [compress.o] Error 1

error with gcc 4.4.7:
g++  -Wall -W -O2 -c -o arg_parser.o arg_parser.cc
g++  -Wall -W -O2 -c -o file_index.o file_index.cc
g++  -Wall -W -O2 -c -o compress.o compress.cc
compress.cc:34:19: error: lzlib.h: No such file or directory
compress.cc: In function ‘void_<unnamed>::cworker(void_)’:
compress.cc:378: error: ‘LZ_min_dictionary_size’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:380: error: ‘LZ_Encoder’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:380: error: expected primary-expression before ‘const’
compress.cc:380: error: expected ‘;’ before ‘const’
compress.cc:382: error: ‘encoder’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:382: error: ‘LZ_compress_errno’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:382: error: ‘LZ_ok’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:384: error: ‘LZ_mem_error’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:395: error: ‘encoder’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:395: error: ‘LZ_compress_write_size’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:400: error: ‘LZ_compress_write’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:405: error: ‘LZ_compress_finish’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:407: error: ‘encoder’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:408: error: ‘LZ_compress_read’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:414: error: ‘LZ_compress_errno’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:414: error: ‘LZ_strerror’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:420: error: ‘LZ_compress_finished’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:423: error: ‘encoder’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:423: error: ‘LZ_compress_close’ was not declared in this scope
compress.cc:378: warning: unused variable ‘dict_size’
compress.cc:368: warning: unused variable ‘match_len_limit’
make: **\* [compress.o] Error 1

title: removing additional contaminations
body:
Hi,
Does your tool work without any reference genome? If I would provide fasta files with chloroplast and mitochondrial genomes would your tool remove these genomes too?

Thank you in advance.

Michal

title: Cannot access any links
body:
It seems the URL's for the databases and setup files are not accessible anymore: 

```
wget --no-check-certificate https://collaborators.oicr.on.ca/vferretti/borozan_cssscl/data/taxon.tar.gz

> Resolving collaborators.oicr.on.ca (collaborators.oicr.on.ca)... failed: No address associated with hostname.
> wget: unable to resolve host address ‘collaborators.oicr.on.ca’
```
